body:
Create an API that allows new repo types to be added to the Spack core codebase.  The goal would be to eventually allow for all of GitHub to act as one repo.  It's not clear that the current API would fully support that.  But for now, the idea is to create and define the API as things currently stand; and then change it if needed.

@DavidPoliakoff @tgamblin @alalazo
title: Abstract out the Repo Interface
